transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Sir I am calling from Tamil Nadu, Krishna Section Roofing. Uh yeah sir, I have called you. Good morning sir.

Customer: Good morning sir.

Customer: Sir my phone not leads coming sir.

Executive: Okay. Uh actually very worst sir.

Customer: Sir very worst sir. I am paid 180,000 last sir. One month after not converted sir. Very very worst sir. India Mart is not supported sir. Not I am not happy sir.

Customer: Daily our leads false leads checking na.

Customer: Hmm hmm. False leads checking. Coming leads na not my account not listed sir. Very worst sir. Delivery maximum package very very worst sir.

Executive: Actually sir I am missing office. When I will be available on system I will call you back and discuss regarding the issue in a brief.

Customer: Okay sir. I will also talk to my senior because you have complaint regarding the same I think two to two times. Sir okay sir Tamil person calling me sir. India India Tamil person calling sir I am speaking sir.

Executive: Okay okay I will arrange your call with Tamil. Okay sir okay. Okay sir okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads on phone.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's support.

- Feels the leads are false and not converting.

- Dissatisfied with the package.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back to discuss the issue.

- Executive will talk to his senior.

- Executive will arrange a call with a Tamil speaker.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer support, language
